channel.title: I need to kno how to make a server
channel.description: Can somebody tell me how to make a moparscape private server i am new at this and i have no clue how to make one plz help me andbody thanhk you

item.title: I need to kno how to make a server
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Go to Melissa T’s hamachi server guide to learn how to make a hamachi server.

Or, you can go to Mod Taharok’s Ultimate server guide in the Tutorials Section.
